comment_body: I’d say break up with the gf AND the lover. Cheating ruins relationships beyond repair (in ref to your gf), and neither you nor your male lover seem in the right place for a long-term relationship. You say you’re in love, but is it because his infatuation satisfies your need for supply? Are you just going through the high of being in a new relationship? I don’t mean to invalidate your situation, I’m just trying to view it with your NPD in mind, which I know from personal experience can blind me from seeing what is ACTUAL love and what is just obsession/short-term bliss.
